resources.string: Skintific Pure Centella Acne Calming Toner

Centella Asiatica Extract, or gotu kola, is a skincare superhero known for its diverse benefits. It speeds up skin healing, reduces inflammation, and fights signs of aging by boosting collagen production. \n \nIdeal for sensitive skin, it manages acne, soothes irritation, and maintains skin health. Found in various skincare products, a patch test is recommended before use to check for any adverse reactions.
